column1: Local Foods////Walking in everything is sleek and contemporary but also "green". You def get a clean feeling so you're assured you won't be grossed out. Their concept is Organic local ingredients. Â So food is prepared fresh with fresh ingredients and you won't have to worry about added steroids. Featured items are dishes with things like kale
column3: and pine nuts. They have great choices of veggies like fresh carrots
column5: and pickled peppers. They also have pretty good wines for you to dive in with. We looked around and everyone had a glass of their featured white wine so we both decided to get a glass.
